main event: Two pilots observed a metallic object moving at a high speed over Bellefontaine, Ohio on August 1, 1952.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar, reaching speed estimates in excess of 1,000 miles per hour,The object appeared to be metallic and rotated as it traveled,The pilots observed the object at altitudes between 12,000 feet and 20,000 feet,Multiple sightings were reported in the area by local residents and pilots of F-86 aircraft,The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes before the object disappeared from view.
